question: Question_09
statement:
\textbf{Full-Solution Problem. Justify your answer and show your work.
Full simplification of numerical answers is required unless explicitly
stated otherwise.}

Find the area of the largest rectangle which has two vertices on the
\emph{x}-axis and two vertices lie on the graph of the function
$\displaystyle y=8-x^2$ with $\displaystyle -\sqrt{8}\le x \le\sqrt{8}$.
Please justify your answer.
